desc: At Red Door Home Store, we believe home should be the most comforting and refreshing space in our lives. Shop from our collection of home decor and let your home grow and change with you, not just through the seasons of the year but also through the seasons of life.

layout.text: We offer a unique shopping experience for home decor, furniture, faux florals, gifts and seasonal accents. Visit our store in Topeka for the full line of product!
